Sipna College of Enginnering And Technology, Amravati

Event Name : Startup Conclave

Embark on a transformative journey at our Startup Conclave where diverse teams showcase unique ideas, pitch to judges and compete for prizes, fostering innovation and entrepreneurial excellence.

Date and Time : 8th February 2024

Location : Sipna College of Engineering And Technology, Amravati

Entry Fees :
• One / Two Participants: 200/-
• Three / Four Participants: 300/-.

Prizes :
• Winner : ₹5000
• Runner Up : ₹3000

Coordinators :

  • 1) Shreejit Umale : 9359583740
  • 2) Shruti Khandare: 9146342158
  • 3) Gauri Deshmukh : 8975531687
  • 4) Chanchal Rathi :8767227496

Rules & Regulations

  • 1. A team must consist of a maximum of 4 and a minimum of 1 participant.
  • 2. Each team is allowed to present only one startup idea.
  • 3. Team members can be from the same or different fields and colleges.
  • 4. Internet facilities will not be provided during the event.
  • 5. No mentors will be provided by the organizing committee.
  • 6. Participants must report at 9 am on the event day.
  • 7. Participants are required to bring their own laptop or pen drive containing their presentations or any necessary hard copies.
  • 8. Pitching will be conducted individually in front of the judges.
  • 9. Bring your college ID Cards and Receipt on event day.
  • 10. All the participants will be awarded with " Participation Certificates ".

Note : No abusive language, unfair mean will be tolerated, In such case the team will be disqualified.
